title.narrative: DON'T USE 605.02 SOCIAL NORMS

description.narrative: By 2015, social practices that are harmful to children - and especially girls - are reduced, which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The basic components of a national child protection system are functioning in all States
